name: Trip 2 Naples
description:
Did you not have time to take a vacation this summer?

Are you overwhelmed by your job and the mundanes of day to day life?

Now you have the chance to leave your world behind and go on an enriching
cultural trip through the lively streets of Naples,  you wont believe you're not actually there.  

So pack your bags and head for the airport, your flight leaves in an hour!
